FuncDef:
The auto-report command enables the automatic NE report function.
The undo auto-report command disables the automatic NE report function.
By default, the automatic NE report function is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable a gateway network element (GNE) to automatically report a new NE's information to an NMS, run the auto-report command so that the network management system (NMS) can manage the new NE promptly.
Prerequisites
The DCN feature has been enabled globally using the dcn command in the system view.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
